channel.title: Song Cover
channel.description:
I tried covering Carried Away by my favorite band Passion Pit. I couldn't find a instrumental version of the song so I just sang over an acoustic version I found on youtube. My voice is the male voice in it, it's my first cover so I'm looking for thoughts. Sorry for the background noise too, I don't have a good mic.
https://soundcloud.com/carri3d-away/carried-away-cover-passion-pit
